head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WASSERMAN, SEYMOUR, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WASSERMAN, SEYMOUR, M.D.

block.p: WASSERMAN-Seymour, M.D. 87 of Lake Worth, Florida on August 18, 2000. Graduate of Tulane University Medical School. Radiologist at Southside Hospital, Bay Shore, NY, Huntington Hospital, NY and Central Islip State Hospital, NY. Survived by wife Beatrice, daughter Vicki, son-in-law Kevin and granddaughter Brittany. Services 2PM Sunday, August 20 at Menorah Gardens Funeral Chapel. Donations may be made to Hospice of Palm Beach County.
